definition.name: Package and Publish
definition.description: Publish actions as OCI artifacts to GHCR

inputs.name: github-token
inputs.description: The GitHub actions token used to authenticate with GitHub APIs

outputs.name: package-manifest-sha
outputs.description: A sha256 hash of the package manifest

outputs.name: attestation-manifest-sha
outputs.description: The sha256 of the provenance attestation uploaded to GHCR. This is not present if the package is not attested, e.g. in enterprise environments.

outputs.name: referrer-index-manifest-sha
outputs.description: The sha256 of the referrer index uploaded to GHCR. This is not present if the package is not attested, e.g. in enterprise environments.

evidence.reasoning: The action focuses on publishing actions as OCI artifacts, which falls under the Publishing category, while also requiring authentication with GitHub APIs, placing it in the Authentication category as well.
